subject: Mathematics
title: Subsets
description: Subsets are a useful concept in set theory. In this lesson, we will learn what subsets are, how to determine if one set is a subset of another, and how to find the number of subsets of a given set.
objectives: Know the definition of a subset
Understand how to determine if one set is a subset of another
Be able to find the number of subsets of a given set
